p:
A repeated measures ANOVA calculated the change in ocean acidification knowledge across condition and from the pre-test to post-test. The difference in ocean acidification knowledge from the pre-test [ M = 2.51, SE = 0.26; 95% CI (1.99, 3.03)] to post-test [ M = 8.25, SE = 0.31; 95% CI (7.61, 8.88)] was statistically significant, [ F (1, 46) = 290.23, p < 0.001,
Î·

2
= 0.86], but there was no difference in knowledge gain across Coral and Scuba Diver conditions [ t (45) = 0.06 p = 0.95, d = 0.02].
